data.title: AI Dream Prediction Service Launch
data.tasks: Developed and launched an AI-powered dream prediction service, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to analyze dream patterns and provide personalized insights.

data.title: Machine Learning Research and Development
data.tasks: Conducted research and development in machine learning algorithms for dream analysis, laying the foundation for the AI dream prediction service.

data.title: AI Dream Analysis Prototype
data.tasks: Developed a prototype for AI-powered dream analysis, showcasing the potential for personalized dream insights.
